Author: veritas
Content: I doubt it.  After all, the people behind Y cominator would want the best ideas/teams to get funding and the fairest way to do that would be to take a look at all applications at the same point.  So my guess is, they'll wait until the deadline passes, review all applications and then give out their responses.

Author: smackaysmith
Content: Excellent deconstruction of a Whole Foods presentation. I'm a bit shocked that a CEO would come to Berkeley with PPT slides containing ugly Excel charts that are impossible to understand unless you were sitting in front of the monitor.

Author: gin
Title: If you submit your application early to Y combinator, do you get a response early?

Author: ynot
Content: Hmm.. whats your definition of spam?

Author: Leonidas
Content:
Y Combinator would be the ideal place to meet other people like yourself who is passionate,have energy, and will provide you with feedback, which is a really difficult thing to find. It's like having a constant adrenaline rush.

The chance, the opportunity to work on your passion and project FULL TIME, how cool is that?

Great article adam

Author: Leonidas
Content:
Thanks for the post. I've always enjoyed reading other entrepreneur's viewpoint on things. A lot of people have doubted POF's success but why focus on whether you think his strategy is working? I'd rather focus on what he's doing right, what his users like and what they don't.

Quite fascinating artile. Thanks Staunch.
